info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 28 at 11:53AM EST until further notice by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Rappahannock River at Remington affecting Culpeper and Southern Fauquier zones. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Rappahannock River at Remington. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water reaches the top of the boat ramp at Kellys Ford. At 15.0 feet, Tin Pot Run Road and Sumerduck Road near Remington are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 9.3 feet, or 5.7 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information. && River Name Fld Observed Sun Mon Mon Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 7PM 1AM 7AM Stg Time Date Rappahannock River Remington 15.0 9.3 Sun 11 am 13.3 14.2 11.9 14.2 1am Mon &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/washington or www.weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM EST.
